channel.title: Developercamp on stesie's musings
channel.description: Recent content in Developercamp on stesie's musings

item.title: comparing the incomparible -
item.description: Lucky me, living in the metropolitan area of Nuremberg, … this year I attended three different developer-oriented open spaces hosted within one hour driving range from home. devops camp in Nuremberg, six iterations so far, first one back in March 2014 And starting this year there are now two developer-centric events (both more or less claiming to be the first one): developercamp in Würzburg, back in September 2016 swecamp in Tennenlohe/Erlangen, right yesterday & today
